sec.title: Service braking system for wheel-mounted rigs

list-item.label: a)
list-item.p: The service braking system shall give a braking force, in N, equivalent to not less than 35Â % of the maximum rig mass multiplied by 9,81. For manoeuvring and holding rigs on steep slopes, see also 4.19.2.

list-item.label: b)
list-item.p: The service brake system shall be capable of retarding the rig with at least 1 m/s2 on the maximum permitted gradient as specified by the manufacturer.

list-item.label: c)
list-item.p: For rigs with hydrostatic transmission, service braking action may be performed by means of the hydrostatic transmission, if the performance requirements given in 4.7.1 a) are met.

list-item.label: d)
list-item.p: The service brake shall be resistant to heat fade.
